title: DRC Vault (Vertically integrated fund)
body:
DRC are well known with most farms now as a aggregator which is great marketing, I think we could build on that goodwill. As users use the victim model (which is our core product and we should stick with and expand) we could offer our own Vault as a extra for those who wish to add funds for holding and investing with DRC

I think if we do a DRC Vault fund it needs to be safe and a decent return but safety is key over the long term and we should market as that.
choices: Yes a DRC Vault and more victims
author: 0xe5df77b5c1C541cDA961bAFBdaB2b9FB94831f98
